title: Tahmahri is now recruiting! Plat+ Top/Jung/Support needed.
body:
As The Knights have been disbanded I am now looking to create my own semi-serious team.
I will be managing the teams schedule/comps etc until another suitable person for this role can be found.

Looking for players who are willing and able to train 10ish hours a week.
I am currently looking for the following:

Top Laner:

Jungler: Filled
Mid Lane: Filled
ADC: Filled
Support: Filled

I will also look into getting a TS server if we can find the right people.
Feel free to add me if you are interested, or post below.
.
.
.
EDITS:
The only position left is the TOP lane.
I will also be able to make a website for our team.

replies.body: p3 sup main could be down for some ranked, abnormalx

Could be keen. Ended P3 last season, peaked D5. 
Currently sitting at Plat V. Support main.
I will add you in game for details.
Eya im plat 5 atm :) top player lemme know :D

Hello, I'm High gold quality so far (shown at the end of S5) but i never had a chance to play all the way to the end of my capabilities. Maybe you could give me a trial of some sort, as im close to plat tier. (JG/TOP main)
Sorry, your rank is too low.
